recommendations: Cmdr (Dr.‚Åπ) Reji Kurien Thomas , FRSA, MLE‚Ñ† ‚ÄúI am delighted to provide a heartfelt recommendation for Mr Akshay Makar, a trailblazing climate entrepreneur and the adept MD of CLIMATENZA Solar. Akshay's journey spanning over eight years in the realm of sustainability has been nothing short of exceptional. His resolute dedication and remarkable achievements speak volumes about his unwavering commitment to driving positive change in the world. I had the privilege of getting acquainted with Akshay during an enriching encounter in Belgium. Our paths converged as our respective companies were selected for the prestigious 100+ Accelerator challenge. From the outset, it was evident that Akshay's passion for sustainable solutions and innovative thinking was truly remarkable One cannot overlook Akshay's impressive recognition as a Forbes 30 under 30 honoree, a distinction that underscores his remarkable contributions to the field. His recognition as an Echoing Green Fellow in 2019 further accentuates his deep-rooted commitment to creating a sustainable future. As an accomplished TEDx speaker, Akshay possesses the rare ability to communicate complex ideas with clarity and conviction, making him sought-after in the realm of Renewable Energy and Solar Thermal technologies Akshay's role with CLIMATENZA Solar, a pioneering solar thermal startup, showcases his visionary leadership and profound impact. The company's focus on deploying clean energy technologies across the industrial sector reflects Akshay's unwavering dedication to driving meaningful change on both local and global scales Notably, Akshay's accolade as BP's #Lead2030 Winner demonstrates his strategic thinking and solution-oriented approach. By answering the #SDG challenge to increase the share of renewable energy by 2030, he exemplifies his dedication to creating a sustainable future. His visionary thinking is further evidenced through his founding of Climatenza, a solar thermal company operating in India and Chile. The company's innovative application of concentrated solar power technology to generate high-value energy for industrial applications underscores Akshay's innovative spirit I am particularly impressed by Akshay's proactive approach to collaboration and mentorship. His genuine eagerness to connect with like-minded professionals reflects his commitment to continuous learning and driving collective progress towards a sustainable future Akshay's dedication to sustainability, renewable energy, and solar innovation is not just commendable, but truly inspirational. His unique ability to blend deep expertise with a forward-thinking mindset sets him apart as a true change-maker. Akshay's impact extends beyond his role as a climate entrepreneur; he is a catalyst for transformative change, making a lasting impression on both the industry and our planet. It is with great enthusiasm that I recommend Mr Akshay Makar for his exceptional contributions and his relentless pursuit of a better, more sustainable world.‚Äù
